description:
Im single, kind, dont cheat, have money , a house, nice cars, cute kittens, a great job, and seahorses.....i would trade it all for someone to hold.

Here is how i spend most every morning....

I get home from work to a big quiet house... i hate being single. I feed my 2 pretty white kittens, then i feed my Seahorses. I spend about an hour reading to my fans on YouTube, then i crawl into my big comfy bed and fall asleep to Netflix. 

On my days off i like to go for walks, drive my nice car, and relax in my hot tub or grill on my deck... 

If you think you would like to hang out with me, or can help me with having to do all this stuff alone, please message me, i really miss having someone to come home to. someone to cook for, and someone to spoil.
